verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: warned] [ARG2: Russia] [ARG1: of imminent military action in Syria] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , [ARGM-PRP: in response to a suspected poison gas attack over the weekend] .
President Donald Trump warned Russia of imminent military action in Syria on Wednesday , in response to a [V: suspected] poison gas attack over the weekend .
